waitlist.privacy_notice: We respect your privacy. No spam, unsubscribe anytime.

features.ai_content.description: Generate engaging posts, captions, and hashtags with advanced AI technology.
features.multi_platform.title: Unified Multi-Platform Management
features.multi_platform.description: Manage Instagram, Facebook, and soon LinkedIn & X from one dashboard.
features.media_editing.title: AI-Instructed Media Editing
features.media_editing.description: Edit images and process videos using simple natural language commands.
features.productivity.title: Streamlined Productivity Tools
features.productivity.description: Presets, context files, and a comprehensive media library to boost efficiency.

video_section.description: Witness how our AI-powered suite simplifies content creation and management. (Teaser videos & screenshots coming soon!)
cta.title: Ready to Elevate Your Marketing?
cta.description: Download the Crow's Eye Marketing Suite today and start creating smarter, faster, and more effectively.
demo.title: Crow's Eye Demo
demo.subtitle: Experience AI-powered content creation in your browser
demo.prompt_placeholder: e.g., 'Make it sound professional and inspiring'
demo.limitations.title: Demo Limitations
demo.limitations.files: Limited to 5 media files per session
demo.limitations.ai: Simulated AI responses (not connected to real AI)
demo.limitations.features: No video editing or advanced features
demo.limitations.note: Download the full desktop app for complete functionality!
demo.select_description: Upload an image or video to experience AI-powered content generation
demo.ready_description: This demo shows just a glimpse of Crow's Eye's capabilities. Download the full desktop application for advanced AI features, video editing, social media posting, and much more!
download.title: Download Crow's Eye Marketing Suite
download.description: Get the full desktop application: Your AI-Powered Command Center for intelligent, multi-platform social media marketing. Leverage Google's Gemini for unmatched content generation and media enhancement.
download.one_click: One-click installation - no technical knowledge required!
download.everything_included: Complete marketing suite with AI capabilities - everything included, no additional software needed
download.windows_steps:
1. Double-click the downloaded .exe file
2. Click "Yes" if Windows asks for permission
3. Follow the setup wizard (auto-installs everything)
4. Launch from Desktop - ready to use!
download.macos_steps:
1. Double-click the downloaded .dmg file
2. Drag Crow's Eye to Applications folder
3. Right-click and select "Open" first time
4. All dependencies install automatically!
download.linux_steps:
1. Make the .AppImage file executable
2. Double-click to run (auto-setup on first launch)
3. Or run from terminal: ./CrowsEye.AppImage
4. Everything works out of the box!
download.included.ai: Google Gemini AI integration ready to use
download.included.no_tech: No Python, coding, or technical knowledge needed
download.documentation_desc: Check out our comprehensive documentation and user guides on GitHub.
download.community_desc: Join our community for help, tips, and to share your creations.
